Bepop Fitness uses your location to provide accurate parcel tracking and timely delivery updates. By accessing your address, we ensure that you receive real-time information about your parcels' status and estimated delivery times.

Bepop Fitness uses your location to provide accurate parcel tracking and timely delivery updates. By accessing your address, we ensure that you receive real-time information about your parcels' status and estimated delivery times.

The Bepop Fitness app uses your device's microphone to enhance your fitness experience. We utilize voice commands for guided workouts, enabling you to interact with the app hands-free. Your microphone is also used for recording workout notes and feedback. We respect your privacy and do not store any audio without your consent.
Bepop Fitness application tracks your steps
Bepop Fitness requires access to the photo library to upload your Profile photo.
Bepop Fitness requires access to the photo library to upload your Profile photo.

We use speech recognition to provide voice-controlled workout instructions and track your progress during workouts in the Bepop Fitness app. Access to the microphone is required to ensure accurate and convenient voice interactions with the app.
